title: Álex and Marc Márquez to train on Mondraker F-Podium RR XC bikes for Moto GP Season
content:
Alex and Marc Marquez, the biggest names in Grand Prix, have partnered with Mondraker in preparation for their 2021 MotoGP Season. The brothers have each been given fully customized F-podium RR carbon cross-country bikes which they plan to use for cardio training.
